DbSql.sql: select * from(select TNAME name,'dbo' cuser,DECODE(TABTYPE,'TABLE','U',TABTYPE) type,'' dates,tc.comments from tab t,user_tab_comments tc where TABTYPE='TABLE' AND t.tname=tc.table_name)

SELECT column_id AS colorder,t.table_name AS TableName,t.column_name AS columnname, data_type AS typename, data_length AS LENGTH, data_precision AS preci, data_scale AS scale, '' AS isidentity, (SELECT DECODE (COUNT (*), 0, 'N', 'Y') FROM user_constraints a, user_cons_columns b WHERE a.constraint_name = b.constraint_name AND a.table_name = t.table_name AND b.column_name = t.column_name AND a.constraint_type = 'P') AS ispk,nullable AS cisnull, data_default AS defaultval, col.comments AS detext,rf.rftable, rf.rfcolumn FROM user_tab_columns t,user_col_comments col, (SELECT fc.column_name, cc.table_name rftable,cc.column_name rfcolumn FROM user_cons_columns fc,user_constraints ft,user_cons_columns cc,user_constraints ct WHERE ft.constraint_type = 'R' AND fc.table_name = 'CO_ORDER' AND ft.table_name = 'CO_ORDER' AND fc.constraint_name = ft.constraint_name AND ct.constraint_name = ft.r_constraint_name AND ct.constraint_name = cc.constraint_name AND cc.POSITION = fc.POSITION) rf WHERE t.table_name = col.table_name AND t.column_name = col.column_name AND t.column_name = rf.column_name(+) AND t.table_name = 'CO_ORDER' ORDER BY column_id
